rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming foyer with open design to allow positive energy flow according to Vastu principles. Suitable for both residential and commercial access.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area located on the south-east side, aligned with sunlight and ventilation per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for convenience. Placed in the east or north direction as per Vastu norms to encourage positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with ample storage and workspace, positioned on the west side following Vastu principles for cleanliness and prosperity.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility area adjacent to the kitchen for storage or laundry.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with dedicated spaces on either side, designed to accommodate vehicles as per local building norms and security guidelines.

openings.description: Large entrance door ensuring proper flow of energy and ventilation.
Secondary entrance for service or emergency access.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom located in the south-west quadrant as recommended by Vastu for calm and relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom designed on the north-east side to promote positivity and restful sleep.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Adjacent bedroom ensuring privacy, placed in a stable Vastu corner.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom ideally for children or guests, oriented in the north-west quadrant.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional guest room with access to the living area, aligned on the east side per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom design placed centrally or in the south-east zone following Vastu to prevent water accumulation issues.

rooms.name: Study Room/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated study room/office space located in the north-west, beneficial for productivity and concentration per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Balcony overlooking the courtyard, enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Additional opening for ventilation or access from the roof terrace.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Indoor private gym space designed to promote health and well-being, strategically placed on the roof deck with abundant natural light.

rooms.name: Terrace/Courtyard
rooms.description: Multi-use outdoor terrace for relaxation or dining, enhancing overall design aesthetics in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main staircase leading to the roof deck ensuring ease of access and proper energy circulation.
Secondary access for maintenance or utility services on the roof area.

metadata.design_principles: Vastu-aligned design, local building norms compliance, optimized for residential and commercial use.
metadata.notes: This floor plan is an architectural concept that integrates industrial aesthetics with duplex functionality for a seamless blend of style and practicality.
